ref: 14512 churayati: Sh. čhuróĭki̯ is not < *c̣hur -- X čhŭbóĭki̯ s.v. chupáti nor ← K. s.v. kṣōṭayati, since evidence for orig. kṣ -- is prob. non -- existent. Morgenstierne NOPhal 32 beside c̣hōr -- (with which in NTS xii 165 he compares Dm. c̣hār -- s.v. kṣārayati) has also čōr<-> and in closely related Sv. Buddruss has čhor -- , čhur -- .
